fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Sport, Transport, Borders and Security
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Mittelstandsverbund - ZGV e.V., EHI Retail Institution GmbH, IHK, Genossenschaftsverband e.V., BVR, Bankenfachverband e.V., Deutscher Factoringverband e.V., Deutscher Franschiseverband e.V.
goals__remit: The ANWR GROUP is in the industries of shoes, sports and leather goods of the most successful cooperative business networks in Europe. Our associations and franchise systems offer independent retailers customized services. The service divisions include EDI and inventory management, online and e-commerce, financial services, seminars and training. Furthermore, the ANWR GROUP offers a modern exhibition and Order Center.
